Description:
[h1] Welcome! [/h1]

Welcome to the Hardsst game-mode on the Rocket League Workshop, which I call Spiderball! A game-mode with tons of tunnels and crazy paths! This is another version of battlegrounds, but instead of going back and forth, you can go side to side!


[h1] Gameplay [/h1]

- 4v4 game-mode* with 2 balls (Enable it in rocket launcher -> In game mods -> Ball mods)
- DO NOT 1v1. If playing in a 2v2 or 3v3 (4v4 highly reccomended), use 1 ball
- Unlimited Time
- First to 3
- Unlimited Boost

*If you need help finding people to play custom games with, make sure to check out this server made by Balanced Waffle to find players!
https://discord.gg/kVGR4vB

P.S. Boomer Mode is really fun on this map


[h1] GLHF! [/h1]
